DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine nurse manage , protocol drive , disease management process diabetes result improved attainment therapeutic goal diabetes compare usual care . It hypothesize implementation disease management process improve percentage diabetic individual attain three therapeutic target ( HgbA1C < 8.0 % , LDL < 100mg/dl , BP < 130/80mmHG ) 10 % compare usual care .
DOC.criteria: Enrolled Minneapolis VAMC Type 1 2 diabetes Blood pressure screen visit > 140mmHg systolic > 90mmHg diastolic OR HgbA1C screen visit > 9.0 % OR LDL screen visit > 100mg/dL Primary care provider unwilling participant include study Life expectancy < 1 year Unable give consent Severe mental health condition pregnant plan become pregnant
